mdRecord.dcterms:description: This sepia-toned photo on card stock shows 12 Black adults. There are six men standing with six women sitting on chairs in front of them. The back of the photo has a list of names: Perry Robinson, Duc Richardson, Clarence Slood, Ira Hawkins, Al Morrison, Shellie Dock, Nannie Hood, Kessie Banks, Eliza Shalkor, Leana Clark, Gladys Washington, Daisy Evans.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Group Portrait, Men and Women (photograph)
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Photographs
